00053 #ifdef MEDIAINFO_DLL_EXPORT

00055 #else
00056 #define MEDIAINFO_EXP extern _declspec(dllimport)
00057 #endif

00059 /** @brief Kinds of Stream */
00060 typedef enum MediaInfo_stream_t
00061 {
00062	 MediaInfo_Stream_General,
00063	 MediaInfo_Stream_Video,
00064	 MediaInfo_Stream_Audio,
00065	 MediaInfo_Stream_Text,
00066	 MediaInfo_Stream_Chapters,
00067	 MediaInfo_Stream_Image,
00068	 MediaInfo_Stream_Max
00069 } MediaInfo_stream_C;
00070 
00071 /** @brief Kinds of Info */
00072 typedef enum MediaInfo_info_t
00073 {
00074	 MediaInfo_Info_Name,
00075	 MediaInfo_Info_Text,
00076	 MediaInfo_Info_Measure,
00077	 MediaInfo_Info_Options,
00078	 MediaInfo_Info_Name_Text,
00079	 MediaInfo_Info_Measure_Text,
00080	 MediaInfo_Info_Info,
00081	 MediaInfo_Info_HowTo,
00082	 MediaInfo_Info_Max
00083 } MediaInfo_info_C;
00084 
00085 /** @brief Option if InfoKind = Info_Options */
00086 typedef enum MediaInfo_infooptions_t
00087 {
00088	 MediaInfo_InfoOption_ShowInInform,
00089	 MediaInfo_InfoOption_Support,
00090	 MediaInfo_InfoOption_ShowInSupported,
00091	 MediaInfo_InfoOption_TypeOfValue,
00092	 MediaInfo_InfoOption_Max
00093 } MediaInfo_infooptions_C;
00094 
00095 /** @brief Option for Inform */
00096 typedef enum MediaInfo_informoptions_t
00097 {
00098	 MediaInfo_InformOption_Nothing,
00099	 MediaInfo_InformOption_Custom,
00100	 MediaInfo_InformOption_HTML,
00101	 MediaInfo_InformOption_Max
00102 } MediaInfo_informoptions_C;
00103

00105 typedef enum MediaInfo_fileoptions_t
00106 {

00108	 MediaInfo_FileOption_Recursive,
00109	 MediaInfo_FileOption_Close,
00110	 MediaInfo_FileOption_Max
00111 } MediaInfo_fileoptions_C;

00312 #include <string>

00315 namespace MediaInfoLib

00317
00318 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00319 //Char types
00320 #undef  _T
00321 #define _T(__x)	 __T(__x)
00322 #if defined(UNICODE) || defined (_UNICODE)
00323 	typedef wchar_t Char;
00324 	#undef  __T
00325 	#define __T(__x) L ## __x
00326 #else
00327 	typedef char Char;
00328 	#undef  __T
00329 	#define __T(__x) __x
00330 #endif
00331 typedef std::basic_string<Char, std::char_traits<Char>, std::allocator<Char> > MediaInfo_String;
00332 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00333
00334 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00335 /// @brief Kinds of Stream
00336 enum stream_t
00337 {
00338	 Stream_General,				 ///< StreamKind = General
00339 	Stream_Video,				   ///< StreamKind = Video
00340 	Stream_Audio,				   ///< StreamKind = Audio
00341 	Stream_Text,					///< StreamKind = Text
00342 	Stream_Chapters,				///< StreamKind = Chapters
00343 	Stream_Image,				   ///< StreamKind = Image
00344 	Stream_Max,
00345 };
00346 
00347 /// @brief Kind of information
00348 enum info_t
00349 {
00350	 Info_Name,					  ///< InfoKind = Unique name of parameter
00351 	Info_Text,					  ///< InfoKind = Value of parameter
00352 	Info_Measure,				   ///< InfoKind = Unique name of measure unit of parameter
00353 	Info_Options,				   ///< InfoKind = See infooptions_t
00354 	Info_Name_Text,				 ///< InfoKind = Translated name of parameter
00355 	Info_Measure_Text,			  ///< InfoKind = Translated name of measure unit
00356 	Info_Info,					  ///< InfoKind = More information about the parameter
00357 	Info_HowTo,					 ///< InfoKind = Information : how data is found
00358 	Info_Max
00359 };
00360 
00361 /// Get(...)[infooptions_t] return a string like "YNYN..." \n
00362 /// Use this enum to know at what correspond the Y (Yes) or N (No)
00363 /// If Get(...)[0]==Y, then :
00364 /// @brief Option if InfoKind = Info_Options
00365 enum infooptions_t
00366 {
00367	 InfoOption_ShowInInform,			///< Show this parameter in Inform()
00368 	InfoOption_Support,						 ///< how this parameter is supported, could be N (No), R (Read only), W (Read/Write), space (Non applicable)
00369 	InfoOption_ShowInSupported,		 ///< Internal use only (info : Must be showed in Info_Capacities() )
00370 	InfoOption_Max
00371 };
00372 
00373 /// @brief Option for Inform
00374 enum informoptions_t
00375 {
00376	 InformOption_Nothing,					   ///< No options
00377 	InformOption_Custom,						///< Use information given by Inform_Set
00378 	InformOption_HTML,						  ///< Output is in HTML Format
00379 	InformOption_Max
00380 };
00381
00382 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00383 /// @brief File opening options
00384 enum fileoptions_t
00385 {
00386	 FileOption_Nothing,
00387	 FileOption_Recursive,		   ///< Browse folders recursively
00388 	FileOption_Close,			   ///< Close all files before open
00389 	FileOption_Max
00390 };
00391 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00392
00393 class MediaInfo
00394 {
00395 public :
00396	 MediaInfo ()				{Handle=MediaInfo_New();};
00397	 ~MediaInfo ()			   {MediaInfo_Close(Handle);};
00398
00399	 //File
